bookTitle: Sammy Keyes and the Skeleton Man
Plot: After the skeleton plows them over, Sammy and her friends look to see what he was running from . That’s when they find Frankenstein tied to a chair. Someone’s taking “trick-or-treat” way too far! When Sammy starts to dig into what really happened Halloween night, she’s amazed at how many people have something to hide. Of course, Sammy’s got a few secrets herself. And more than a few tricks up her sleeve.
